Name: Beyond TV
Notes:
Not compatible with DVB tuners.
While Snapstream is providing minor fixes for Beyond TV, they no longer actively updating and developing the software as they are focusing on commercial applications. Despite the lack of a new version, their fanbase (in the forums) maintains active and the program is still available.
See also: List of digital television deployments by country

Name: EyeTV
Notes: Free with all Elgato USB tuners, but available separately for use with other tuners.

Name: Hauppauge WinTV
Notes: For Hauppauge TV cards and peripherals

Name: InterVideo WinDVR
Latest stable release: Discontinued. Previously bundled with various TV tuner devices.

Name: JRiver Media Center
Notes: DirectShow video player, audio, images, 10 foot GUI, Remote control, DLNA

Name: MediaPhoenix/ShowShifter
Notes: Supports some older TechnoTrend/Hauppauge boxes which are not BDA compliant, such as the Dec 2000-t/3000-s and first generation Nova-t USB boxes, which are unsupported by other PVR software.

Name: SageTV
Prices: Discontinued since it was bought by Google. Prior to that it had been $79.95 software; $29.95 client; $29.95 per mediaMVP client.
Notes: Java based. SageTV was purchased by Google on 20 June 2011 and its online store was shut.  No statement has been made about the future availability of SageTV products.

Name: Tvtime
Notes: High quality television application for use with video capture cards on Linux systems. tvtime processes the input from a capture card and displays it on a computer monitor or projector

Name: Video Disk Recorder
Notes: TV Done Right, VDR can use one to eight video cards and support DVB-S, DVB-C and DVB-T. Record and read any DVB flux with a lot of plugins.

Name: Windows Media Center
Prices: Free prior to Windows 8 stable releases. US$100 for Windows 8 and 8.1 (respective Pro Pack, retail box pricing); US$10 for Windows 8 Pro and 8.1 Pro (Media Center Pack, online download).
Notes: Included in Windows XP MCE 2005, Windows Vista Home Premium and Ultimate editions, Windows 7 Home Premium, Professional, and Ultimate, and some Windows 8 preview/developer editions. Not included in Windows 8, 8 Pro, 8.1 or 8.1 Pro. Not available for Windows RT.

Name: Kodi (formerly XBMC)
Notes: High quality Open Source PVR, able to watch/record live TV, music, photos and has one of the most expansive collection of plugins, enabling the system to do anything from browsing the web or downloading movies, to dimming the lights in the sitting room.

Name: Windows Media Center
column12: Yes; also respects the "do not record" flag, not supported by US courts.
column13: Supports DVB-T/T2 and DVB-S/S2; does not support DVB-C

Name: DVR
Linux: MPEG-4 ASP (MPEG-4 Part 2), i.e. DivX, XviD
